code:
import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='/api/blogs';//basic request to backend for a clicked word, requested from Blog.js
var getWord=function getWord(word){var wo=word.toLowerCase().slice(0,2);var request=axios.get("/api/blogs/letters/".concat(wo.toLowerCase(),"/").concat(word.toLowerCase()));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.log("Could not get the word in the given form",err);});};//request to return all books in database, unused
var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};//returns titles of books, used in BookList.js
var getBookList=function getBookList(){var request=axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/booklist"));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};//get full information about a book
var getBook=function getBook(title){var request=axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/book/").concat(title));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){var request=axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/mongonew"),newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};// eslint-disable-next-line import/no-anonymous-default-export
export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,getWord:getWord,getBookList:getBookList,getBook:getBook};
